regen.absent_element: verification of absence of history before account deletion
regen.new_specification: The system shall verify that an account has no history before permitting its deletion.

regen.absent_element: evaluation of account history before performing actions
regen.new_specification: The system shall evaluate whether an account has an associated history before allowing it to be deactivated or deleted.

regen.absent_element: warning notification for actions not permitted to deactivated users
regen.new_specification: The system shall notify deactivated users attempting to access the system that their account is currently deactivated and access is denied.

label: If an account has any history associated with it, it can only be deactivated and not deleted.
absence: situation of an account has any history
